bookTitle: That Was Then, This Is Now
Plot: Does growing up have to mean growing apart? Since childhood, Bryon and Mark have been as close as brothers. Now things are changing. Bryon's growing up, spending a lot of time with girls, and thinking seriously about who he wants to be. Mark still just lives for the thrill of the moment. The two are growing apart - until Bryon makes a shocking discovery about Mark. Then Bryon faces a terrible decision - one that will change both of their lives forever.
Characters: Ponyboy Curtis, Bryon Douglas, Curly Shepard, Mark Jennings, Cathy Carlson, Charlie Woods, Angela Shepard, M&M Carlson, Terry Jones, Dirty Dave
